name: Find the Cats
description:
Cat Lady has lost all of her cats! Please find them for her.

Short and easy, kid-friendly 3D hidden object game with plenty of cats to find, spread over several areas.

Features


  • Over 100 cats
  • 8 different areas
  • Voiceover (read by a professional), enabling play even before learning how to read
  • Game starts immediately without needing to navigate written menus
  • Control scheme familiar from Minecraft and Roblox

Mainly intended for kids, but any cat lover is of course welcome to give a go at helping Cat Lady in the scavenger hunt for her lost cats.

The game has been played over 27 million times on other platforms.
